requirement.description: The OPP-115 privacy practice category that is addressed by the annotated phrase.

value.description: The exact word or phrase that is annotated, with non-relevant injected clauses abbreviated as 'PLACEHOLDER'.

performed.description: Indicates whether the phrase addresses the OPP-115 privacy practice category in the positive of negative (e.g. 'we collect X data' vs. 'we do not collect X data').
